description: A rotating machine which may be used as a generator or motor.

contents.name: GeneratingUnit
contents.description: A synchronous machine may operate as a generator and as such becomes a member of a generating unit.

contents.name: p
contents.description:
Active power injection. Load sign convention is used, i.e. positive sign means flow out from a node.
Starting value for a steady state solution.

contents.name: q
contents.description:
Reactive power injection. Load sign convention is used, i.e. positive sign means flow out from a node.
Starting value for a steady state solution.

contents.name: ratedPowerFactor
contents.description: Power factor (nameplate data). It is primarily used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909.

contents.name: ratedS
contents.description:
Nameplate apparent power rating for the unit.
The attribute shall have a positive value.

contents.name: ratedU
contents.description: Rated voltage (nameplate data, Ur in IEC 60909-0). It is primarily used for short circuit data exchange according to IEC 60909.
